event.title: I Love Free Software Day, Oslo, in Norway

body.p: For the first time, we have an "I Love Free Software Day" event in Norway! You are all invited to step by and have a look at our new Norwegian "Ada & Zangemman" books and reach out to all those amazing people behind Free Software and recognize their work by saying ‚ÄòThank you ‚ô•‚Äô.

ul.li: üìç Cafe Amsterdam. Kristian Augusts gate 12, Oslo
üóìÔ∏è Event details are available at their webpage

body.p: At the event we will also present the new Norwegian translation of the well known "Ada & Zangemaan" book, a tale of Software, Skateboards, and Raspberry Ice Cream. Afterwards, we will chat about Free Software and value all the people contributing to software freedom.
